name: Binibo
startIntroPart1:
Binibo, Masters of defense and logistics. 
		                   They are one of the most difficult countries to attack, for their enemies will be met by staunch formations that rival even mountains!
startIntroPart2: Will you be able to live up to their reputation?
declaringWar: I declare thou an enemy of my kingdom!
defeated: Bested, I was. Well done, noble foe.
neutralLetsHearIt: I will hear what you suggest.
hateLetsHearIt: I will hear, but not for long!
hateYes: You are lucky that I accept!
afterPeace: Let us not interfere in each other's buisness, eh?
